title: Ultimate Indie Music Pack
description: 61 songs for your indie game, buy one pack and take three! more than one hour of music for your game
longDescription:
Hello Dev!

This pack was inspired by a series of indie games with elements in common, such as: Sparklite, Fae Tactics, Pathway, Rakuen, UnderMine, Moonlighter, CrossCode, Hyper Light Drifter Forager and others!

This pack contains 61 songs divided as follows:

20 are the Main songs divided into some genres: Adventure / Casual / Animated battle / Tense battle / Rapid / Sad / Electronic.

LISTEN HERE (PREVIEW)

These songs alone have more than an hour of sound!

But the Pack has more!

You will receive 16 small songs, they are small parts, to be used when the player dies, when he wins a battle, when he selects an option, when he finishes a quest, and others. very useful on several small occasions.

And to finish you will receive 3 packs!

One of them is the boss complement pack, made with metal lines using guitars, drums, bass and vocals! It is for sale for $ 10.00 but you will receive it with this purchase!

The second package is strategy and card games, however it can be used in other games that you think will fit! It is also on sale for $ 10.00 but you will receive it with this purchase!

And the third is a pack of SynthWave that I already leave free, however if I were to charge it would be around $ 10.00. And you will also receive together in this pack!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Music Loops
  •  Fanfare

Number of Audio Wavs: 61

Number of Audio Cues: 61

Sample rate / bit rate: ( 44,100 Hz)

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 01:40:00

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: There's no need for documentation it's music only.
